name: Murasaki Shion (Hololive) (Multiple outfit) (9.1MB + old model reupload)
description:
Murasaki Shion (Hololive) LoRA

Thank you for deleting my previous LoRA without any warning (I discovered it delection 1 month later) because "Hololive" and "gothic_l*lita" contain a banned word and excluding the domain from wayback archive means that I can't copy paste my old LoRA description (this is annoying for recommended prompts)

01-05-2023/V2 Update:

  • Reduce the model file size to 9MB.

  • Use a way lower network dim (8 instead of 128) and Alpha (1 instead of 128) to prevent overfitting

  • More flexible

  • Rebalanced dataset (I uploaded it)

  • More accurate official swimsuit

  • Add a new token for each canon outfit (using booru token was a bad idea):
    ShionDefault

    ShionSwimsuit

    ShionGothic

V1 is a reupload of my prevous LoRA

This is a LoRA, this mean that you need to update Voldy/AUTOMATIC1111's webui to use it (use git pull) .

Weight:

You won't need to use a lower weight unless you want to use multiple LoRAs

Recommended prompt:

That LoRA can reproduice some of her models

For V2:

Default outfit:

black gloves,single hair bun, witch hat, vertical-striped_shirt,pinstripe_shirt,midriff, crop top,miniskirt, ShionDefault

Gothic L*lita :

twintails, animal_ear_fluff,gothic_lolita,lolita_fashion,halter dress, cat ears,cat_girl,long dress, halterneck, layered dress,frilled dress, center_frills,detached sleeves, ShionGothic

Official Swimsuit :

bikini, bikini_skirt, black_bikini,criss-cross halter, swimsuit, ShionSwimsuit

For V1:

Same thing as V2 but without ShionDefault,ShionSwimsuit and ShionGothic

Model used for the example:

V1 examples : AOM 2 and Pastel Mix (model version) .

V2 examples : AnythingV4.5

modelVersions.name: v2.0
modelVersions.description:
247 images
6 epochs
4188 steps (batch size:1)
scheduler: cosine
Text encoder learning rate: 1e-5 
Unet learning rate: 1e-3 
max bucket resolution: 512 
clip skip: 2 
dim: 8
alpha: 1 
batch size=1 
Base model: NAI
